Package com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.game_entities

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.game_entities.Player
public class Player extends Object
This class provides different getter-setter methods to for the Palyer entity.
Author:
Sushant Sinha

    • issueOrder

      public boolean issueOrder() throws InvalidCommandException, EntityNotFoundException, ExecutionException, InterruptedException, InvalidArgumentException
      Gets order from the user and stores the order for the player.
      Returns:
      True if the player doesn't want to being asked to issue order.
      Throws:
      InvalidCommandException - If there is an error while preprocessing the user command.
      InvalidArgumentException - If the mentioned value is not of expected type.
      EntityNotFoundException - If the target country not found.
      ExecutionException - If any error while processing concurrent thread.
      InterruptedException - If scheduled thread was interrupted.

    • addExecutedOrder

    • nextOrder

      public Order nextOrder() throws OrderOutOfBoundException
      Gets the first order from the order list and removes the order from the list before returning it.
      Returns:
      Value of order to be executed.
      Throws:
      OrderOutOfBoundException - If the player does not have any order.

      public boolean isNotNegotiation(Player p_otherPlayer)

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getCard

      public Card getCard(CardType p_cardType) throws CardNotFoundException
      Gets the card of specific type from this player's card list.
      Parameters:
      p_cardType - Card type.
      Returns:
      True if player has the card; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      CardNotFoundException - Card not found in the player's card list.
